tagline: Voting Made Simple, Secure, and Empowering
weightedScoreVotingDesc: Our unique voting system allows for nuanced decision-making.
effortlessSharingDesc: Share your voting processes with a simple link or QR code.
consensusDrivenApproachDesc: Find solutions that work for everyone, not just the majority.
userFriendlyInterfaceDesc: Intuitive design makes voting accessible to all.
transparentResultsDesc: See real-time results and understand how decisions are made.
